segments.text: I'll try one of these on . ( The customer tries one of the shoes on . ) It's too big . It slides up and down my heel when I walk around .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let's try a size ten . ( He gets another pair and the customer tries a shoe on ) Looks like a perfect fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really . It pinches my toes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure they'll be fine once you break them in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know ... well , I guess I'll take them , since you don't seem to have anything better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , ma'am . It's been a pleasure doing business with you .
segments.speaker: S2
